# Institutional Investors

## We manage assets on behalf of many of the world’s largest and most sophisticated investors, who in turn represent the interests of millions of workers and retirees

Overview

## Trusted stewards of institutional capital

Fortress has been a trusted partner for institutional investors for over two decades. Our overriding objective is to help these limited partners achieve their investment goals and to support the financial well-being and security of their beneficiaries. These limited partners include public and private pensions, sovereign wealth funds, endowments and foundations, insurance companies and family offices.

1,700 InstitutionalInvestors

50+ CountriesRepresented

8,500 Institutional Commitments

As of December 31, 2023.

![institutional-investors-overview.jpg](/images/general/institutional-investors-overview.jpg)

Experienced and Attentive Solutions Provider

## We build collaborative partnerships by working ceaselessly on behalf of investors and providing creative, bespoke solutions tailored to their unique and changing needs. 

We take pride in lasting partnerships that span the life of an investment and beyond – providing exceptional client service and intellectual capital at every step.

[Learn More](/what-we-do)

![](/images/general/architecture-concrete-curves.jpg)

“We’re confident in our platform because we’ve grown deliberately – with our investors top of mind. As one of the pioneers of private credit, we strive to continually build on our heritage of disciplined performance. We’ve designed an investment infrastructure that we believe is second to none.”

Todd Ladda

Managing Director andHead of Capital Formation

# Financial Advisors

## Fortress Private Wealth Solutions strives to broaden access to alternative investments with innovative, purpose-built and investor-oriented solutions

[Learn More](https://pws.fortress.com)

The Fortress Edge

## We have been a trusted partner to individual investors and financial advisors for over 15 years.

We’ve honed our investment process and private market offerings over market environments, credit cycles, and multiple dislocations in the financial system. Our investment experience and broad expertise are deeply integrated into products designed for individual investors.

15+ years workingin private wealth

![financial-advisors-fortress-edge.jpg](/images/general/financial-advisors-fortress-edge.jpg)

Breadth and Depth

## Our investment capability and global platform span corporate credit, asset-backed finance, real estate, private equity, insurance solutions and multi-manager, and we offer a broad suite of products to financial advisors.

We arm financial advisors with creative solutions designed to serve client needs, from portfolio diversification to volatility management or enhancing risk-adjusted returns. 

20+ Yr Track Record

![record-success.jpg](/images/general/record-success.jpg)

Trusted Partners

## We provide the insights and resources necessary to make informed investment choices and help investors understand the role alternatives can play in their portfolios.

By offering our expertise, innovative solutions, and close partnership, we strive to empower financial advisors as they build optimal investments for their clients.

![financial-advisors-trusted-partners.jpg](/images/general/financial-advisors-trusted-partners.jpg)

## Today, individual investors can access the same resources and capabilities built for some of the world’s largest and most sophisticated allocators

[Learn More](https://pws.fortress.com)

# Insurance

## Insurance companies have trusted Fortress with their private and opportunistic credit allocations for over 15 years

Our team of insurance industry specialists provides innovative solutions to insurance companies globally. Fortress Insurance Solutions is nimble, opportunistic, and experienced at investing in different forms, including via reinsurance, across both the property & casualty and life & annuity sectors.

![](/images/general/insurance-intro.jpg)

Tailored Solutions

Our teams’ multi-disciplinary background and decades of experience enable us to tailor solutions for the unique investment goals of individual insurers.

Investor-Centric

Our team is committed to meeting and exceeding the particular goals of our insurance company partners and their policyholders.

Execution Focus

Our expertise allows us to holistically analyze an insurer’s needs and provide solutions that achieve our partners objectives.

Strategic Partnerships 

## We bring the full resources and experience of the Fortress platform to meeting the needs of insurers.

Our more than 200 investment professionals are sharp, creative, and laser-focused on seeking risk-adjusted returns for our investors. We are trusted to manage insurance allocations around the globe and take pride in partnering with our investors to develop innovative solutions.

[Learn More](/what-we-do/insurance-solutions)

![Strategic Partnerships ](/images/general/conference-room-people.jpg)

Types of Partners

We seek to be a valued partner to all stakeholders in the insurance industry.

Life & Annuity Companies

Property & Casualty Companies

ReinsuranceCompanies

Insurance ProductDistributionPlatforms

Insurance IndustryInvestors
